base_description: Tall, cylindrical, white plastic bottle with pump.
part_description: Consists of a cylindrical body, a pump mechanism on top, and a nozzle. The body is smooth and uniform, while the pump is positioned centrally on the top.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism is connected to a tube inside the bottle, which extends to the bottom. Pressing the pump compresses a spring, creating suction that draws liquid through the tube and out of the nozzle.
external_interaction_description: The bottle is designed to dispense liquid when the pump is pressed by a user. It can be refilled by unscrewing the pump. It interacts with external surfaces by standing upright, and its contents can be applied directly to skin or other surfaces.
